Question: Until his death, this person continued to correspond with Hattie and voluntarily sent child-support payments.
Hints: The Sloper character may in turn have been inspired by Dickens's Mr Micawber, whom this person later played on film.
This person married a fellow vaudevillian, chorus girl Harriet "Hattie" Hughes, on April 8, 1900.
The carnival fraud was not the only character this person played.
